text: Persuasion is a form of influence. It is the way to get people to agree with an idea, attitude, or action by rational and emotional means. It is a problem- solving strategy and relies on "appeals" rather than force. Dissuasion is the process of convincing someone not to believe or act on something. ==Methods of persuasion== * Evidence * Logic * Rhetoric * Scientific method * Advertising *Moral Appeal * Faith * Presentation and Imagination * Propaganda * Tradition *Manipulation Aids to persuasion: * Body language * Communication skill or Rhetoric Other techniques, which may or may not work: * Hypnosis Coercive techniques, some of which are highly controversial and/or not scientifically proven to be effective: * Brainwashing * Torture Category:Psychology
title: Persuasion
